actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-741.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4941 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and section 101 (1) (2) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-741) Provides that for purposes of determining who is a substantial contributor to a foundation, for tax purposes, contributions made before October 9, 1969, which were made on account of or in lieu of payments required under a lease and made because of a reduction in rental payments required under the lease, are not to be treated as contributions to the foundation.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4941 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and section 101 (1) (2) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.
